For <S%H6492>Pekah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7425>Remaliah<s%> <S%H2026>slew<s%> in <S%H3063>Judah<s%> 120000 in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2428>valiant<s%> <S%H1121>men,<s%> because they had <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of their fathers.

"And <S%H6258>now<s%> you are <S%H559>proposing<s%> to <S%H3533>subjugate<s%> for yourselves the <S%H1121>people<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> for <S%H5650>male<s%> and <S%H8198>female<s%> <S%H8198>slaves.<s%> <S%H5650><s%> <S%H7534>Surely,<s%> [do] you not [have] <S%H819>transgressions<s%> of your <S%H5973>own<s%> against the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>?

<S%H6258>"Now<s%> therefore, <S%H8085>listen<s%> to me and <S%H7725>return<s%> the <S%H7633>captives<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> you <S%H7617>captured<s%> from your <S%H251>brothers,<s%> for the <S%H2740>burning<s%> <S%H639>anger<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is <S%H5921>against<s%> you."

So the <S%H9139>armed<s%> men <S%H5800>left<s%> the <S%H7633>captives<s%> and the <S%H957>spoil<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H8269>officers<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6951>assembly.<s%>

Then the <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> were <S%H9344>designated<s%> by <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H6965>arose,<s%> <S%H2388>took<s%> the <S%H7633>captives,<s%> and they <S%H3847>clothed<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H4636>naked<s%> <S%H4636>ones<s%> from the <S%H7998>spoil;<s%> and they <S%H3847>gave<s%> them <S%H3847>clothes<s%> and <S%H9336>sandals,<s%> <S%H398>fed<s%> them and <S%H8248>gave<s%> them <S%H8248>drink,<s%> <S%H5480>anointed<s%> them [with oil,] <S%H5095>led<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H3782>feeble<s%> ones on <S%H2543>donkeys,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> them to <S%H3405>Jericho,<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H8558>palm<s%> <S%H8558>trees,<s%> to their <S%H251>brothers;<s%> then they <S%H7725>returned<s%> to <S%H8111>Samaria.<s%>

<S%H3588>Although<s%> <S%H271>Ahaz<s%> <S%H2505>took<s%> a <S%H2505>portion<s%> out of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> and out of the <S%H1004>palace<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> and of the <S%H8269>princes,<s%> and <S%H5414>gave<s%> [it] to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria,<s%> it did not <S%H5833>help<s%> him.
